body:
Thanks for the comprehensive documentation updates! A few thoughts:

1. The Grafana agent documentation looks great - very thorough coverage of the provisioning patterns.
2. I appreciate the migration from 10N to LAW prefix - much clearer team identification.
3. Minor suggestion: Could we add a troubleshooting section for common API authentication errors?

Overall LGTM! Let me know if you need any clarification on the Grafana API endpoints.
